name: shell-game
description: A token shuffling module for Foundry VTT.

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:prep && npm run package:zip && npm run package:clean
scripts.package:prep: rimraf release/shell-game && mkdirp release/shell-game && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*" release/shell-game
scripts.package:zip: cd release && npx bestzip shell-game.zip shell-game
